name: Donald Ness
headline: Mobile, UI, Cloud, Data
intro: 10+ years of experience bringing data to life with software engineering and design.

sections.title: Key Accomplishments
sections.content:
* Hired and mentored junior developers helping to level up skills and careers
* Rapidly developed prototypes securing capital investment and partnerships for startups
* Experience in many development stacks including web, mobile, and embedded
* Shipped dozens of apps in domains spanning healthcare, IoT, robotics, education, real estate, e-commerce, sports, and the maker community.

items.title: Software Consultant (Full-Time)
items.content:
* Architected mobile application, and mentored a team of in-house mobile developers to improve a popular education platform.
* Led engineering and design of business automation platform, data warehouse, and business intelligence reporting system for an online learning platform.
* Hired and mentored a junior developer from Galvanize to succeed in developing their first professional web application.
* Led engineering of mobile, web, and backend technology as part-time CTO for [HealthSteps](https://healthsteps.io), a mobile health platform.
* Designed and implemented mobile SDKs, example apps, technical documentation and consumer apps for [Jilia](https://jilia.io) an IoT platform.
* Advised companies on cloud migrations to reduce cost and risk, and improve performance of their applications.
* Architected, developed, and deployed mobile apps, web apps, and APIs for clients.

items.title: Senior Software Engineer (Full-Time)
items.content:
* Designed and developed remote control software for modular toy robots for iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows.
* Shipped 11 mobile apps (8 for iOS, 3 for Android) and 3 desktop apps (cross-platform macOS and Windows).
* Created core iOS SDKs and Node.js modules used to power software for consumer apps, and manufacturing processes.
* Designed and implemented a Bluetooth Low Energy profile for interacting with the MOSS Bluetooth LE module.
* Led approval process through Apple's MFi program for multiple Bluetooth Classic accessories.
* Developed firmware for AVR, PIC, and ARM Cortex-M0 microprocessors using C.
* Led a team of high school interns to develop a mobile game that interfaces with MOSS hardware.

items.title: Mobile Software Developer (Full-Time)
items.content:
* Developed mobile applications for iOS and Android.
* Led improvements to the development process by introducing unit testing and code reviews.
* Created backend libraries successfully used by the company in multiple projects, notably a data sync client similar to Parse.
* Collaborated with clients, project managers, and designers to deliver high quality enterprise mobile and web applications.

items.title: Former Co-Founder (Part-Time Joint Venture)
items.content:
* Released Scribe, a successful productivity app for macOS, to the Mac App Store.
* Developed advanced text processing components (I have an intimate relationship with NSTextView), as well as audio and graphics components in Cocoa.

items.title: Software Developer (Full-Time)
items.content:
* Led mobile development on iOS, Android, and Windows Phone platforms.
* Improved original Apple App Store rating from 2 ½ stars to 4 ½ stars within six months for flagship product, increasing customer satisfaction.
* Reduced Android-related helpdesk calls an estimated 90% by re-engineering application to achieve compatibility across all major device manufacturers.
* Designed and developed front-ends in JavaScript with jQuery and ExtJS backed by ASP.NET and MSSQL.

items.title: Lead Software Developer (Full-Time)
items.content:
* Led daily Scrum meetings and reviewed code of junior developers.
* Drafted functional specifications for review by a Senior Software Engineer.
* Reduced internal training and development costs by building a reusable web platform which supported common functionality across multiple company brands.
* Managed Linux servers on Amazon EC2 with custom scripts for code deployment, and data backup.
* Improved web user experience and saved bandwidth costs by increasing site performance by tuning SQL queries, caching, debugging and optimizing code with tools such as JMeter and XDebug.

items.title: Software Developer (Full-Time)
items.content: Developed social media software used by 100,000 daily unique college sports fans and alumni.

items.title: Software Development Intern (Part-Time)
items.content: Developed pharmaceutical grade Java software, which conducted double-blind experiments for new drugs and medical devices, keeping patient confidentiality and eliminating experimenter bias.

items.title: Software Development Intern (Part-Time)
items.content:
* Developed user interfaces for Java-based MVC web applications for airlines such as JetBlue, Delta, and Continental.
* Tested complex client-server applications for function, performance, and concurrency metrics.
* Automated functional and regression testing by scripting data-driven tests.

items.title: Undergraduate Researcher (Part-Time)
items.content:
* Researched genetics, microbiology, and statistical algorithms applied to understand the pathology of *Magnaporthe grisea* fungi in rice crops.
* Wrote a k-fold cross-validator to validate machine-based gene predictions in DNA sequences with known genes identified in our labs and in BLAST databases with BioPerl and other open source tools.

items.title: Graphic Designer (Part-Time)
items.content: Designed book covers, bookmarks, business cards, and other print materials with Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator.

items.context: Guided a team of high school students at the Innovation Center of the St. Vrain Valley School District to develop an iOS game for an educational robotic system.

sections.title: Technologies
sections.content:
My experience is primarily focused on iOS mobile development using Swift and Obj-C, and I am well rounded in Android with Java. I have specialized experience with mobile and hardware integrations, primarily Bluetooth Classic and Bluetooth LE, and I have developed embedded applications in C on PIC, AVR, and ARM microarchitectures.

I am also a full stack web developer with back-end expertise with NodeJS, C#, Python, Ruby, and PHP and front-end expertise with JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, AngularJS, and more. I am a skilled database programmer with PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Couchbase, and SQLite. I have cloud deployment experience using Heroku and AWS.
